quickpost.page.title: Sell Your Item via Free Classifieds on Gumtree Ireland
quickpost.page.desc: Sell an iPhone, Clothes, Furniture, Kids Toys, Laptops, Appliances, TV on Gumtree Ireland
quickpost.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a short description about what you are selling (min 10 characters)
quickpost.descriptionTipTitle: Items with good description sell faster !
quickpost.descriptionTip1: Mention brand, model, age and accessories
quickpost.descriptionTip2: Mention condition, features and reason for selling
quickpost.descriptionTip3: If the item is still under warranty, mention it

postad.image.upload.failure.invalid.size: Attention: Image size must be under 12 MB.
